headline: Republican National Committee sues the January 6 Committee for ‘unlawfully seizing information’
author: Eric Garcia
sentences: Earlier this year, the RNC censured the committee’s sole Republicans Adam Kinzinger and Liz Cheney for “participating in a Democrat-led persecution of ordinary citizens engaged in legitimate political discourse, and they are both utilizing their past professed political affiliation to mask Democrat abuse of prosecutorial power for partisan purposes.”
